text: Joe Wark (9 October 1947 - 1 October 2015) was a Scottish professional footballer. He spent all of his professional career with Motherwell. He made 464 appearances for the club in the Scottish Football League between 1968 and 1984. He was born in Glasgow. Wark died after a long illness on 1 October 2015. He was 67. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Footballers from Glasgow
title: Joe Wark
